name: Waifu Gear Solid
description:
Waifu Gear Solid

An odd mix of stealth game genre and lovely Visual Novel genre designed for Ludum Dare 41's theme - Combine 2 Incompatible Genres.
Featuring skillfully drawn heroine with dialog system and point and click adventure element in it.

Your favourite anime is about to air soon. Can you make it back in time to watch it without getting stopped by you lovely heroine? Check them out in the game! 

This game is created together by North (Coder), DeadPotato (Designer), and Sprygon (Artist) from OverClock Studios!

# Credits to

Konami (Metal Gear Solid) for the Sound and Inspiration
